title.narrative: Isiolo Integrated Drought Response and Recovery Project (IIDRRP)

description.narrative: The pastoral counties of Kenya are experiencing the third consecutive failed/ below average rain season with Isiolo County amongst the hardest hit. According to Isiolo County Drought Early Warning Bulleting for May 2022 , the county is at an alarm phase with worsening trends. Pasture and browse regeneration are insufficient and their condition ranges from fair to poor and is expected to worsen as the drought condition persists. Food security situation continues to deteriorate, and more households are falling into the crisis phase of IPC classification. The whole County is expected to remain generally dry during the months of June, July, August and September, 2022. The impact of the drought is manifested in among others. The project will directly target 400HHs (2,000 individuals) as beneficiaries. They will be drawn from Burat ward – Leparua village and Oldonyiro ward – Kawalash and Lengwenyi villages. 250HHs for cash transfer, 100HHs livestock feeds, 50HHs micro-irrigation.
